#{item} ORDER BY m.SORT asc

SELECT m.ID AS ID, m.`NAME` AS `NAME`, m.PARENT_ID AS PARENT_ID, m.CONTENT AS CONTENT, m.SORT AS SORT, m.CP AS CP, m.CT AS CT, m.EP AS EP, m.ET AS ET, m.OPTIONAL_ID AS OPTIONAL_ID, m.GRAPHICS_ID AS GRAPHICS_ID, m.MEUN_TYPE AS MEUN_TYPE, ps.ID AS PS_ID, hps.HOSPITAL_ID AS HOSPITAL_ID, ps.PLATFORM_ID AS PLATFORM_ID, o.CONTROLLER_PATH as CONTROLLER_PATH FROM SYS_MENU AS m INNER JOIN SYS_PLATFORM_SETTINGS_MENU AS psm ON psm.MENU_ID = m.ID INNER JOIN SYS_PLATFORM_SETTINGS AS ps ON ps.ID = psm.PLATFORM_SETTINGS_ID INNER JOIN SYS_HOSPITAL_PLATFORM_SETTINGS AS hps on hps.PLATFORM_SETTINGS_ID = ps.ID LEFT JOIN SYS_OPTIONAL AS o on o.ID = m.OPTIONAL_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_PLATFORM AS p on p.ID = ps.PLATFORM_ID WHERE hps.HOSPITAL_ID = #{hospitalId} and p.CODE='easyHealth' ORDER BY m.SORT asc
mapper.update: update SYS_MENU set NAME = #{name}, CONTENT = #{content}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId}, OPTIONAL_ID = #{optionalId}, GRAPHICS_ID = #{grapicsId}, MEUN_TYPE = #{meunType}, SORT = #{sort},EP = #{ep},ET = #{et} where ID = #{id}
